scripts.buf:sync: rm -rf proto && rm -rf _tmp && mkdir -p proto/ramp/v1/  && git clone --depth 1 git@github.com:harbour-tech/be-ramp-service.git _tmp && mv _tmp/proto/ramp/v1/public.proto proto/ramp/v1/ && rm -rf _tmp
scripts.buf: yarn buf:sync && yarn buf:generate && yarn prettier --write ./src/gen/
